enumTagOnExports.js(2,1): error TS2304: Cannot find name 'exports'.
enumTagOnExports.js(5,1): error TS2580: Cannot find name 'module'. Do you need to install type definitions for node? Try `npm i --save-dev @types/node`.


==== enumTagOnExports.js (2 errors) ====
    /** @enum {number} */
    exports.a = {};
    ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'exports'.
    
    /** @enum {string} */
    module.exports.b = {};
    ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2580: Cannot find name 'module'. Do you need to install type definitions for node? Try `npm i --save-dev @types/node`.
